name: Butterfly
description: Platformer game with interesting gimmick. You can't jump, so you must bounce off your enemies or use tubes to your advantage. Both platformer skills AND logic are required to complete 40 challenging levels!
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 / 10 Processor: 1.2GHz processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 8-compatible graphics card with at least 32MB of video memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 120 MB available space
